name: desktop_screenshot
author: openclaw@example.com
description: Captures a screenshot of the user's actual desktop (not web pages). Returns base64 encoded image that can be analyzed by the LLM.

parameters.name: monitor
parameters.description: Monitor number: 1 for primary monitor, 2 for secondary, etc.

parameters.name: region_x
parameters.description: X coordinate of region to capture (optional)

parameters.name: region_y
parameters.description: Y coordinate of region to capture (optional)

examples: Take a screenshot of my desktop
Screenshot the top-left corner of my screen
